Text: RE Disclosure Policy Cc OKAY Disregard Thanks Irma Alvarez HR Svc Connection Ext Original Message From Baines Geoff Sent Monday November AM To Baines Geoff HR Service Connection Subject RE Disclosure Policy Apologies Message sent in error please do not reply Geoff Baines Original Message From Baines Geoff Sent November To HR Service Connection Subject Disclosure Policy Has anybody produced a disclosure policy for the Data Protection Act or a general policy on this subject If you could send me a copy i would appreciate it Also the engineering constuction IR issue at Lundbeck chemicals over nd tier payments is according to my sources unlikely to spread to other sites However if you have any intelligence on this subject i would appreciate a call or an email Thanks Geoff Baines ETOL

FW Disclosure Policy Cc Okay Who has expertise in this area Please advise so that I can provide Geoff a point of contact for further assistance Thank you Irma Alvarez HR Svc Connection Ext Original Message From Baines Geoff Sent Monday November AM To HR Service Connection Subject Disclosure Policy Has anybody produced a disclosure policy for the Data Protection Act or a general policy on this subject If you could send me a copy i would appreciate it Also the engineering constuction IR issue at Lundbeck chemicals over nd tier payments is according to my sources unlikely to spread to other sites However if you have any intelligence on this subject i would appreciate a call or an email Thanks Geoff Baines ETOL
